H3.text: what is the name of sonia gandhi daughter. Priyanka Vadra

A4.text: Sonia Gandhi has two children, Rahul Gandhi and Priyanka Vadra, who both serve as Members of Parliament in the Lok Sabha.

A5.text: Sonia is the widow of Rajiv Gandhi, elder son of Indira Gandhi.
